resources.string: Do you have a heart condition ?
Do you have a first-degree relative (father, mother, brother or sister) who had heart problems (heart attack, stroke, sudden death) before age 55 for a man or before age 65 for a woman ?
Do you have a cholesterol problem ?
Have you already checked with your doctor about your cardiovascular risk ? (Yes/No/I don\'t remember)
Have you ever had a cardiac check-up (Default = No)
Have you ever consulted a cardiologist ?
Do you ever drink more than 3 glasses of alcohol in a day once or twice a week (including wine and beer)?
Do you ever drink energy drinks ?
Do you sleep more than 7 hours a night ?
Are you prone to sleep disorders ?
